comments.body:
Casio FX-991EX classwiz

They don't allow you to carry calculator cover in the exam hall and calculators with built-in constants is a blessing.
Ig 991CW is the one replacing it, skip 991es as it is subpar
I got cw it works very well and looks damn cool. It even has equations till biquadratic..
cool, will get this only then

Don't forget to check an online user guide lol. It's manual doesn't have shit. I was going to return it thinking it doesn't have differentiation and integration. I learnt how to get to that node after checking the online guide.
I have a fx991ms is it good?
